title: Fire & Blood
description: Fire & Blood is a fantasy book by American writer George R. R. Martin. It tells the history of House Targaryen, a family from his series A Song of Ice and Fire

title: A Dream of Spring
description: A Dream of Spring is the planned title of the seventh volume of George R. R. Martin's A Song of Ice and Fire series. The book is to follow The Winds of Winter and is intended to be the final volume of the series.
